thread.title: Migos' "CULTURE" Tops Billboard 200; First Week Sales Revealed
thread.title_full: Migos' "CULTURE" Tops Billboard 200; First Week Sales Revealed

author: Trevor Smith
title: Migos' "CULTURE" Tops Billboard 200; First Week Sales Revealed
text:
Home > Music > Migos'"CULTURE" Tops Billboard 200; First Week Sales Revealed Migos'"CULTURE" Tops Billboard 200; First Week Sales Revealed 1 0 Posted by Trevor Smith , Feb 5, 2017 at 05:22pm The Atlanta trio has earned their first #1 album. 
After earning their first #1 song on the Billboard Hot 100 with "Bad and Boujee" last month, Migos ' sophomore album CULTURE has debuted at #1 on the Billboard 200. This marks the Atlanta trio's first #1 album to date, with their previous album Yung Rich Nation peaking at #17.The album totaled at 131,000 in sales, most of which came in the form of streaming equivalent album units. The album moved 44,000 units traditionally, 10,000 in track equivalent album units, and 77,000 in streaming equivalent album units (the last figure making up 59% of the total).Meanwhile, Kehlani's debut album SweetSexySavage comes in at #3 with a more even ratio, moving 58,000 units with 32,000 sold traditionally.
